about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the world of DanceXR, an unparalleled character model viewer and motion player designed to bring your favorite characters to life with ease.

DanceXR enables you to animate models in PMX, XNALara/XPS, VMD, and BVH formats with unmatched versatility. It is the market's most user-friendly character animation tool, allowing you to animate any model, anywhere, effortlessly.

Forget the limitations of T-pose or A-pose, the absence of certain bones, or improper scaling. DanceXR's intelligent system automatically adjusts everything for you, ensuring seamless integration and animation.

But DanceXR offers more than just motion playback. Its comprehensive suite of built-in tools and sophisticated settings menus allows you to customize and refine every aspect of your experience. Whether you're tweaking motion playback or adjusting materials for the perfect visual presentation, the possibilities are limitless.

Available across a wide range of platforms, from mobile to high-end PC VR, DanceXR ensures you can enjoy your creations wherever you are.

content_descriptors.notes:
Since users are free to load any model and motion available on the Internet with this program, it might be potentially easy for them to find and use models and motions that depict nudity and explicit activities. It's important to note that the program itself does not provide or endorse such content; users are solely responsible for the materials they choose to use.

Although this program is not sex-focused, it does contain several procedural motions that are sex-related. Additionally, there are motion adjustment features that allow users to modify the playback to achieve certain poses and motions. Users can also load external objects and attach them to specific body parts of the model. However, these functionalities constitute only a small portion of the features provided.

DanceXR enables you to animate models in PMX, XNALara/XPS, VMD, and BVH formats with unmatched versatility. It is the market's most user-friendly character animation tool, allowing you to animate any model, anywhere, effortlessly.

Forget the limitations of T-pose or A-pose, the absence of certain bones, or improper scaling. DanceXR's intelligent system automatically adjusts everything for you, ensuring seamless integration and animation.

But DanceXR offers more than just motion playback. Its comprehensive suite of built-in tools and sophisticated settings menus allows you to customize and refine every aspect of your experience. Whether you're tweaking motion playback or adjusting materials for the perfect visual presentation, the possibilities are limitless.

Available across a wide range of platforms, from mobile to high-end PC VR, DanceXR ensures you can enjoy your creations wherever you are.
name: DanceXR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3, AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel i5, AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space

short_description: DanceXR: Animate any character model effortlessly, anywhere. The definitive tool for creating MMD music videos and immersive VR experiences.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Simplified Chinese
